name: curupira
description: MCP Frontend Debugging Tool - AI-powered debugging for React applications

scripts.docker:release: npm run version:sync && npm run version:bump:patch && npm run build && npm run docker:push
scripts.docker:release:minor: npm run version:sync && npm run version:bump:minor && npm run build && npm run docker:push
scripts.docker:release:major: npm run version:sync && npm run version:bump:major && npm run build && npm run docker:push
scripts.docker:push: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t drzzln/curupira:latest -t drzzln/curupira:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --push .
scripts.version:sync: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const fs=require('fs'); ['mcp-server','cli','shared','auth','integration','e2e','mcp'].forEach(ws=>{ const p='./'+ws+'/package.json'; if(fs.existsSync(p)){ const w=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p)); w.version=pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync(p, JSON.stringify(w, null, 2)+'\n'); } });"
scripts.test:verify:all: npm run test:verify:core && npm run test:verify:integration && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ All Core Tests Verified!'
scripts.test:verify:core: cd mcp-server && npx vitest run src/__tests__/mcp/tools/ src/__tests__/mcp/resources/
scripts.quality: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && npm run type-check
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && npm run docker:build && ./scripts/deploy-staging.sh

author: Nexus Team
